The Cambridge Handbook of THE LAW, ETHICS AND POLICY OF ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE

This informative Handbook provides a comprehensive overview of the legal, ethical, and policy implications of arti/f_icial intelligence (AI) and algorithmic systems, with a focus on Europe. As these technologies continue to impact various aspects of our lives, it is crucial to understand and assess the challenges and opportunities they present.

Key Concepts:

  • Legal implications of AI
  • Ethical considerations of algorithmic systems
  • Assessing challenges and opportunities presented by AI
  • Theoretical foundations of AI and its applications
  • Impact of AI on various aspects of life
Artificial Intelligence Law Ethics Policy Europe
